channel.title: Arcade Lover - SlowByDesign [Synth Pop, Nostalgic, Electronic]
channel.description:
This is one of my favs :slight_smile:
https://soundcloud.com/slowbydesign/arcade-lover
PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/wvorACBe8eh1rJetAznNEg==
The main melody kept getting stuck in my head - so I knew I had to finish it üëçüèª
It also has a lot of key changes and interesting music theory stuff I experimented with.
Enjoy üëåüèª
